website_summaries.verdict: An attractive watch that is suitable for everyday wear and looks good with numerous fashions. A good choice for women who prefer a larger watch and traditional, no-frills looks.
pros: Sleek, classic looks that never go out of style
Rich, tan leather strap is complemented by the lustrous champagne-colored face and gold-tone metal
Can be worn by a woman or man
cons: Gold number markers are difficult to read in bright light
A larger watch that may be too bold for women with thin wrists

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch,great price.The band didn't fit, replaced with dark brown alligator..
customer_reviews.author: Slammer

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. It was a gift for my dad and I had to returned it! It’s looks pretty nice but it was too small for him
customer_reviews.author: Claudia yaunner pasto

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than what I paid...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice low profile on my wrist. Looks more expensive than what I paid for it. The band is a lighter tgan what I had envisioned but a good looking watch and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Myron

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice on my wrist, better designed for women. I like the gold color and also the light brown band. Overall it was a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking watch. Positive comments on the look from others. Like the easy to read face and the tan watch band.
customer_reviews.author: knothead

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to read, especially in sunlight. Everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to read, especially in sunlight. Everything is gold: the plate, numbers and hands. I wore it for a few days then ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Thaddeus J Kellam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking watch. Leather band is very comfortable and works well most clothing styles.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch. Very small, not for men
customer_reviews.text: Great looking watch! Very very small on the wrist. Not good for a man but gave to my mother and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: William Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love it looks beautiful on my wrist
customer_reviews.text: Love it looks beautiful on my wrist. The only thing is the straps are men standard and my wrists are small. However it works on the last hole
customer_reviews.author: F. Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: a little bigger than expected and long straps for an average woman
customer_reviews.text: i love my new watch. looks a little big for a woman wrist but i like it.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous for a girl
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I've a small wrist and it suits perfectly. It's a gorgeous watch.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Manuel de Bello B.

customer_reviews.title: Back to basics
customer_reviews.text: Amazing.. Love this watch!!!!!!! Simple .. Elegant classical ... Simply exquisite ...
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Rossouw

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch
customer_reviews.text: Love it! the leather straps are lighter in person than this picture. But i like it. The only problem is the dials on the watch are not the same as the one in the picture which i like the one in the picture more. I WOULD recommend this watch its beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: The bottom line is the product was useless out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The watch was lagging about 1 hour behind within 24 hour period. Not sure whether it was defective or the battery was old. Even if it is the latter I should not be put in a position to replace the battery on a watch that I just purchased. The bottom line is the product was useless out of the box. Whether it is Bulova's fault or the retailer's fault - it does not matter to me as a consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stone

customer_reviews.title: It looks refurnished!!! I opened it and ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks refurnished!!! I opened it and it's scratched. The Mica, the borders and in the back have scratches everywhere. The date doesn't work well. In only 6 days it shows a wrong date. I dont really feel that this is an original watch. I feel robbed and beyond dissapointed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Marin M

customer_reviews.title: Less but more. Simple yet Elegant.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice . Elegant. Gave it as a Gift to my hubby. Looked very nice on him. My hubby is very particular. He loves the simplicity get elegant. Wouldn't hesitate to give as gifts .
customer_reviews.author: Ginflyn

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this watch! The color in person ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch! The color in person is a little lighter than the picture online. Nonetheless, he still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: NaturalLove

product_meta.title: Bulova Unisex 97B135 Analog Display Japanese Quartz Brown Watch
product_meta.description:
In 1875, a young Czech immigrant named Joseph Bulova set up shop in New York City, and a legendary American watch brand was born. Bulova was trained as a jeweler, and his expertise carried over into his watchmaking career, which began around 1911 with boudoir clocks and pocket watches, and soon evolved to include what was then one of the latest and most fashionable technological innovations: the wristwatch.

 Bulova introduced its first line of wristwatches in 1919. The company grew and prospered, and soon early radio and television ads were declaring, "America runs on Bulova time." In the 1950s, continuing its legacy of innovation, Bulova introduced Accutron, the first electronic watch, and the first breakthrough in timekeeping technology in over 300 years. The Accutron timing mechanism was later adapted for use by NASA computers and a Bulova timer was even placed on the moon to control transmissions of data. Bulova timepieces have kept official time aboard Air Force One and have also served as official timepieces for U.S. Olympic teams.

 Today, Bulova maintains its tradition of excellence in technology and design, offering a diverse collection of beautiful precision timepieces for every occasion.



From the Dress Collection. In stainless steel with gold-finish, champagne sunray dial, luminous hands, calendar, second hand, brown leather strap, and water resistance to 30 meters.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :4.6 x 3.7 x 3.5 inches; 3 Ounces
 * Item model number :97B135
 * Department :Unisex-adult
 * Batteries :1 CR123A batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :February 15, 2014
 * Manufacturer :Bulova
 * ASIN :B00I6D6VU6
 * 
 * Domestic Shipping:Item can be shipped within U.S.
 * International Shipping:This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
